CustomField.description: Values less than 9 are discarded and not considered valid matches. In theory this can be as high as 100 but in practice values 9-12 are weak matches, 12-15 is a good match and 16 or more is a strong match
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Values less than 9 are discarded and not considered valid matches. In theory this can be as high as 100 but in practice values 9-12 are weak matches, 12-15 is a good match and 16 or more is a strong match
CustomField.label: Match Score
